"x-requested-with": "mark.via",

"user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; PACM00 Build/QP1A.190711.020) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/108.0.5359.79 Mobile Safari/537.36"}

ruleBookInfo.author: @get:{a}
ruleBookInfo.init:
@put:{n:"[property$=book_name]@content",
a:"[property$=author]@content",
k:"p.line@span.0@text&&[property~=category|time]@content",
w:"p.line span.1@text",
l:"[property$=latest_chapter_name]@content",
i:"[property$=description]@content",
c:"[property$=image]@content",
u:"text.查看目录@href"}
ruleBookInfo.name: @get:{n}
